My Alex solo run team was Chaos Ruler with Windhose MH, Kokkoro, 5* Siete and Monika, Sevastian and Young Cat backline. Don't have Nio at the moment. MC skills: unpredictable, ROA, dispel. Unpredictable + Kokkoro s3 + Monika s2 will cap def down while ROA will cap atk down. Dispel is very needed. High DATA and charge bar gain from Windhose ougi + Siete, Kokkoro and Monika skills will ensure Kokkoro heals and buffs frequently to keep up with the hp loss. Summons are FLB Tiamat as main, 3 MLB Zircon Carbuncles and HalMal. I suggest using Grimnir support for the 10k shield and the 140% ele atk up. [Siete at 5* can make a difference between life and death](https://streamable.com/mlh0m) I rather have a few 5* eternals that I can use than a skin, personally. Eternals at 4* really feels lackluster.

Tried a weaker version of OP's setup (MLB Colo, 5 3* s10 Colo canes), was able to hit 14.6m. Need to press Lyria 2 as well with this setup, but considering stronger aura of FLB Colo and sk15 canes, they *might* not need it.

My current setup for upcoming gw is MC with double windhose, Lyria, FLB Siete, S.Jeanne. Lyria and Siete has high ougi cap and provides 30% charge bar for themselves while Jeanne provides 40% defense down and 10% party charge bar (only she needs it). S.Jeanne 1, 2 - gt; MC Dual arts+Splitting spirit - gt; Lyria 2 - gt; Siete 2. 6 skills total. Add in Siete 1 and I can 5 chain ougi again turn 2. Hopefully the harder ex+ has less than 30m hp so i can run this. Other elements: Earth: Lyria, Grand Eugen, Aletheia. Full ignition team. Might need external source of ougi cap to actually otk. Water: ~~Everyone because Bonito~~ Lyria, Aqours 2nd years, Silva. Full ignition team. Silva skill 1 gives her super high ougi cap to reach otk numbers. Fire: Lyria, Ghandagoza, Tsubasa. Ghandagoza skill 2 gives him full ignition and ougi cap up. Add in Tsubasa skill 2 and Shiva call, can reach 20m turn 1 without external ougi cap up source. No idea for light and dark *shrug*
When the halo has full charge diamonds. Prevent it from triggering by putting debuffs on the halo before or when the halo has full diamonds.

You only need to element change the CCW. After that, it will unlock the quest. Changing the CCW's element requires elemental centrums, which only drops from magna HL raids. So yes, you need to be HL (101+) to unlock class IV jobs.
